description: Azubuike is recovering from ankle and foot surgery, according to Sarah Todd of The Deseret News.
Porter Jr. has been cleared for on-court contact, according to Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN.
The 76ers announced that Green has a torn ACL and LCL in his left knee.
There's hope that Isaac will be ready for the start of the 2022-2023 season in October, according to a report from the Orlando Sentinel.
The Grizzlies announced that F Jaren Jackson Jr. underwent surgery and his recovery time is 4-6 months.
Bazley is out with a non-displaced tibial plateau fracture in his right knee according to Thunder Communications.
The Pelicans announced that Lewis Jr. suffered a torn ACL and a grade 2 MCL sprain.
Leonard has had no restrictions placed on his ACL recovery per the Athletic.
There are growing concerns that Lonzo Ball will miss the start of the 2022-2023 season per the athletic.
Saric had surgery repair his right knee. There is no timetable for his return, according to Dave McMenamin of ESPN.
Simmons did not play this past season and no timetable has been announced for his return.
